questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) A statue of a person
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A statue at sunset

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A person sitting on a bench
B) A statue of a person
C) A tree in bloom
D) A building

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A statue of a person
B) A flower bed
C) A pond
D) A playground

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A busy street
B) A sunset sky
C) A dense forest
D) A mountain range

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A statue's silhouette
C) A car
D) A fountain

What is the statue doing?
A) Sitting
B) Running
C) Balancing on one foot
D) Holding a book

What is the color of the sky in the background?
A) Blue
B) Grey
C) Pink and purple hues
D) Green

What can be seen to the left of the statue?
A) Another statue
B) A tree branch
C) A bird
D) A person

What is the statue's posture?
A) Sitting with legs crossed
B) Standing with arms crossed
C) Balancing with one arm extended
D) Lying down

What is the position of the statue's arms?
A) Both arms down
B) Both arms up
C) One arm extended, one arm back
D) Both arms crossed

What is the statue standing on?
A) A pedestal
B) A ball
C) The ground
D) A chair

How many legs of the statue are touching the ball?
A) None
B) One
C) Two
D) Three

What kind of scene does the background depict?
A) A stormy weather
B) A clear sunny day
C) A sunset or sunrise
D) A night scene

What element is present in the photo but not the main focus?
A) A car
B) A tree branch
C) A bicycle
D) A signpost

How does the statue appear in the photo?
A) In full color
B) As a silhouette
C) Partially visible
D) Blurred

What does the photo emphasize about the statue?
A) Its color
B) Its texture
C) Its shape and form
D) Its historical significance

What is the overall theme of the photo?
A) Historical significance
B) Modern life
C) Balance and tranquility
D) Urban chaos

What kind of statue is depicted in the photo?
A) An animal statue
B) A human figure statue
C) A mythical creature statue
D) An abstract art piece
